desc.en: Atsuko gets bored while on standby in an abandoned school and contacts Sensei to play a school game together.
desc.jp: Atsuko gets bored while on standby in an abandoned school and contacts Sensei to play a school game together.
desc.zh_cn: 在被弃置的学校废弃建筑里等待的{cf敦子}，为了消磨无聊的时间，找来老师一起来玩学校游戏。

name.en: A Place to Watch the Meteors
name.jp: A Place to Watch the Meteors

desc.en: Nodoka is looking forward to observing the meteor shower coming to Kivotos, but becomes disappointed when the forecast predicts cloudy weather. [USERNAME] Sensei gets permission to access the rooftop of the Schale building so she can go above the clouds.
desc.jp: Nodoka is looking forward to observing the meteor shower coming to Kivotos, but becomes disappointed when the forecast predicts cloudy weather. [USERNAME] Sensei gets permission to access the rooftop of the Schale building so she can go above the clouds.
desc.zh_cn: {cf和香}满怀期待地想观测来到奇普托斯的流星雨，但天气预报却说今天是阴天，这让她大失所望。为了{cf和香}，[USERNAME]老师取得许可，得以进出位置比云层更高的{et夏莱}大楼屋顶。

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

desc.en: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.jp: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十二首曲子，尤其用于“故事”页及其下属页面中，以及每个故事的结尾（即“To Be Continued”未完待续界面）。

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.zh_cn: 等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

name.jp: When You Wish Upon a Meteor

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Sensei heads to the Former Institute after completing their duties at Red Winter Academy and runs into Shigure alone. Shigure explains that all of the drinks have frozen over due to the bitter cold and casually hands some vodka to a very shocked Sensei.
desc.jp: Sensei heads to the Former Institute after completing their duties at Red Winter Academy and runs into Shigure alone. Shigure explains that all of the drinks have frozen over due to the bitter cold and casually hands some vodka to a very shocked Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 完成{sn赤冬}联邦学园的业务后，老师前往了旧校舍。老师在那边遇见了独自坚守冈位的{cf时雨}。{cf时雨}说饮料全都因为酷寒而结冻，很自然地就递出了伏特加，让老师觉得相当伤脑筋。

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

hobby.jp: 自家製ドリンクを作ること

desc.en: The future here, seemed to be unforeseeable. Example: Alkaline Tears, Theme 140
desc.jp: The future here, seemed to be unforeseeable. Example: Alkaline Tears, Theme 140
desc.zh_cn: 这里的未来，似乎看不到了。举例/联想：Alkaline Tears、第140首曲子
举例/联想：第135首曲子、第140首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

hobby.jp: 自家製ドリンクを作ること

desc.en: The future here, seemed to be unforeseeable. Example: Alkaline Tears, Theme 140

举例/联想：第135首曲子、第140首曲子

desc.en: Sensei, Shizuko, and the Inner Discipline Club start looking for the person behind the recent events, but preparations for the festival ramp up and scatter the search team. As soon as another festival begins, commotion strikes once more.
desc.jp: Sensei, Shizuko, and the Inner Discipline Club start looking for the person behind the recent events, but preparations for the festival ramp up and scatter the search team. As soon as another festival begins, commotion strikes once more.
desc.zh_cn: 为了追查此事件的元凶的老师、{cf静子}和{cn修行部}由于突如其来的庆典任务而被打散。就在这时候，庆典的另一边发生了骚乱。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en:
The Idol of Momoyodou invites Sensei to Hyakkiyako's Cherry Blossom Festival!
But trouble arises when the streets are overrun by delinquents and...a ninja?!
Brace yourself as the uproarious fun begins!
desc.jp:
The Idol of Momoyodou invites Sensei to Hyakkiyako's Cherry Blossom Festival!
But trouble arises when the streets are overrun by delinquents and...a ninja?!
Brace yourself as the uproarious fun begins!
desc.zh_cn:
因为接到了传统吃茶店「百夜堂」的看板娘突然打来的电话，
老师决定前往{sn百鬼夜行}联合学园的祭典「百夜之春樱花祭」！
但是神秘的问题儿童们和忍者女孩却正在那里作乱！？
狂乱的祭典骚动，即将开始！

desc.en:
The Idol of Momoyodou invites Sensei to Hyakkiyako's Cherry Blossom Festival!
But trouble arises when the streets are overrun by delinquents and...a ninja?!
Brace yourself as the uproarious fun begins!
desc.jp:
The Idol of Momoyodou invites Sensei to Hyakkiyako's Cherry Blossom Festival!
But trouble arises when the streets are overrun by delinquents and...a ninja?!

因为接到了传统吃茶店「百夜堂」的看板娘突然打来的电话，
老师决定前往{sn百鬼夜行}联合学园的祭典「百夜之春樱花祭」！
但是神秘的问题儿童们和忍者女孩却正在那里作乱！？
狂乱的祭典骚动，即将开始！

name.zh_cn: 被揭露的阴谋与在那之后

desc.en: Sensei finally comes face-to-face with the ring leader: the Merchant Guild President Date Meowru. Just as Sensei is about to unleash hell on Date Meowru for exploiting Izuna's dream in order to ruin the festival, Izuna breaks in and rescues Sensei.
desc.jp: Sensei finally comes face-to-face with the ring leader: the Merchant Guild President Date Meowru. Just as Sensei is about to unleash hell on Date Meowru for exploiting Izuna's dream in order to ruin the festival, Izuna breaks in and rescues Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 最后老师遇到的雇主，就是商人会长喵天丸。就在为了破坏庆典而利用{cf伊树菜}的梦想的喵天丸惹怒老师的时候，{cf伊树菜}闯进来解救老师。

hobby.en: Studying the art of ninjutsu, squiring her lord
hobby.jp: 忍術の勉強、主殿の護衛
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 学习忍法卷轴、保护主公

desc.en: Sensei and Izuna are backed into a corner when the Festival Department and the Inner Discipline Club show up to save the day. Having anticipated the backup, Date Meowru calls in a horde of Mouryo students and the situation looks grim.
desc.jp: Sensei and Izuna are backed into a corner when the Festival Department and the Inner Discipline Club show up to save the day. Having anticipated the backup, Date Meowru calls in a horde of Mouryo students and the situation looks grim.
desc.zh_cn: 在老师和{cf伊树菜}面临危机之际，{cn节庆营运管理部}和{cn修行部}的学生现身解救。伺机而动的喵天丸唤来无数妖怪剧团学生，使得所有人陷入危机。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
被揭露的阴谋与在那之后

desc.en:
The Idol of Momoyodou invites Sensei to Hyakkiyako's Cherry Blossom Festival!
But trouble arises when the streets are overrun by delinquents and...a ninja?!
Brace yourself as the uproarious fun begins!
desc.jp:
The Idol of Momoyodou invites Sensei to Hyakkiyako's Cherry Blossom Festival!
But trouble arises when the streets are overrun by delinquents and...a ninja?!
Brace yourself as the uproarious fun begins!
desc.zh_cn:
因为接到了传统吃茶店「百夜堂」的看板娘突然打来的电话，
老师决定前往{sn百鬼夜行}联合学园的祭典「百夜之春樱花祭」！
但是神秘的问题儿童们和忍者女孩却正在那里作乱！？
狂乱的祭典骚动，即将开始！

desc.en:
The Idol of Momoyodou invites Sensei to Hyakkiyako's Cherry Blossom Festival!
But trouble arises when the streets are overrun by delinquents and...a ninja?!
Brace yourself as the uproarious fun begins!
desc.jp:
The Idol of Momoyodou invites Sensei to Hyakkiyako's Cherry Blossom Festival!
But trouble arises when the streets are overrun by delinquents and...a ninja?!
Brace yourself as the uproarious fun begins!
desc.zh_cn:
因为接到了传统吃茶店「百夜堂」的看板娘突然打来的电话，
老师决定前往{sn百鬼夜行}联合学园的祭典「百夜之春樱花祭」！
但是神秘的问题儿童们和忍者女孩却正在那里作乱！？
狂乱的祭典骚动，即将开始！

desc.en: When Date Meowru's plan fails, the Mouryo run away and Shizuko unleashes her fists of fury on Date Meowru.
desc.jp: When Date Meowru's plan fails, the Mouryo run away and Shizuko unleashes her fists of fury on Date Meowru.
desc.zh_cn: 当喵天丸所准备的杀手锏以失败告终，妖怪剧团便逃之夭夭。此时愤怒的{cf静子}狠狠赏了喵天丸一记重拳。

hobby.en: Serving and charming customers, Idol Punch
hobby.jp: 可愛く接客すること、看板娘パンチ
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 可爱地接待客人、看板娘拳

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。
